newsPage.articlePreviewTitle: Safe Treatment Abroad: Why Europe and Turkey are the Best Choice
newsPage.articlePreviewDescription: The rise of conflicts has led patients to seek safe places for treatment. Germany, Turkey, and Spain offer stability and quality medical care.
